Articles.Content: I know when a kerbal goes on EVA he (or upcoming she) is a part, like almost everything else. How do I access this part to modify, say, the resources a kerbal carries? (planning on making him/her carry EC)

There's no .cfg file to modify, if that's what you're asking for.

You can modify Kerbals through code like this: [https://github.com/taraniselsu/TacLifeSupport/blob/master/Source/AddLifeSupport.cs](https://github.com/taraniselsu/TacLifeSupport/blob/master/Source/AddLifeSupport.cs)
